comments.body:
This is already fixed in 5.5.x. Since there is unlikely to be a 5.0.x release
any time soon I have fixed the broken link directly on web site as well. It will
take a round an hour or so to sync to main web server.

description:
On http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.0-doc/config/service.html, clicking the
Connector link tries to access
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.0-doc/config/connector.html but gets a 404 error.
